meanings.sent1: The woodenheaded man struggled to understand simple instructions.
meanings.sent2: She made a woodenheaded mistake by forgetting her keys inside the house.
meanings.sent3: Despite his woodenheadedness, he always had a smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: Her woodenheaded decisions led her into trouble time and time again.
meanings.sent5: The woodenheaded student couldn't grasp the basic math concepts no matter how hard he tried.

meanings.sent1: The woodenheaded old mule refused to move from its spot.
meanings.sent2: His woodenheaded attitude made it difficult to compromise with him.
meanings.sent3: Even the woodenheaded cat eventually gave in to a belly rub.
meanings.sent4: Her woodenheaded determination to prove her point sometimes caused conflicts.
meanings.sent5: The woodenheaded tree stood firm against the strong winds, refusing to bend.

meanings.sent1: The woodenheaded waiter kept dropping plates as he rushed around the restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She felt woodenheaded as she tripped over her own feet in front of everyone.
meanings.sent3: His woodenheaded dance moves brought laughter to the whole party.
meanings.sent4: The woodenheaded puppeteer struggled to control the marionette's movements.
meanings.sent5: The woodenheaded robot moved in a jerky, awkward manner, bumping into walls.
